topic.title: STEROIDS GIVEN DURING PREGNANCY TO MATURE FETAL LUNGS INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether steroids were given to a mother during a Maternity Episode, for the purpose of maturing the lungs of a Fetus (unborn baby).
